description: Burp插件，让你测试加密报文时像明文一样简单，支持用js/python/java实现hook脚本或任意语言实现grpc/http hook服务来自动解密报文。A Burp plugin makes testing encrypted messages as simple as plain text, supporting the use of js/python/java to implement hook scripts or any language to implement grpc/http hook services to automatically decrypt messages.
notes: 加密报文测试,自动解密
